hero.title: Wedding Violin Services
hero.subtitle: Central Coast Wedding Violinist
hero.description: I can provide all of your sound needs for your special day. Whether you want a simple solo violin, or the whole package: band, sound guy, and DJ… I got you covered.

proposal.title: Planning a Proposal?
proposal.description: Thinking about popping the question? Make it especially romantic by adding solo violin or violin-guitar duo! Hatch a plan, name the place, and we can come out at the perfect moment to surprise your special someone with an unforgettable ambiance. Choose 3 songs from our list or make some custom requests.

packages.name: Ceremony (Solo Violin)
features: 3 songs (from list or custom) for bridal party processional, bridal processional, and recessional

packages.name: Full Ceremony (Violin–Guitar Duo)
features: Sound equipment setup (wireless mics + robust speakers)

packages.name: Full Wedding + DJ
features: Ceremony, cocktail hour, dinner DJ, reception dance party

items.title: Service Area
items.description: San Luis Obispo + Central Coast (TODO: Add specific travel radius)

items.title: Setup & Sound Check
items.description: I arrive early to ensure everything is perfect before your guests arrive.

items.title: Custom Song Requests
items.description: Have a special song in mind? Custom requests are welcome with advance notice.

items.title: Outdoor Weddings
items.description: Weather contingency plans available. I'm experienced with outdoor venue setups.

cta.title: Ready to Make Your Day Unforgettable?
cta.description: Let's discuss your vision and create the perfect musical atmosphere for your wedding.
